sentences.sContent: Prithee , darlingmost! - court me rather than the peevish prolix.
sentences.sContent_eng: Prithee , darlingmost! - court me rather than the peevish prolix.
sentences.sCn: 我请求你， 我的最爱！ 追求我，毋宁倔强的冗说。

remMethod.val: pro (许多) + lix (来自lex) → 话语太多 → 嗦的

trans.tranOther: a prolix piece of writing has too many words and is boring
